Partner with HudsonPrairie

We work with select vendors, delivery partners and independent experts to help clients fill niche skills, scale quickly and deliver complex projects with confidence.

What We Look For in a Partner

Shared Values

Integrity, transparency and respect in how you interact with clients and consultants.

Clear Capabilities

A defined focus – whether that’s a technology stack, industry, or type of role.

Reliable Delivery

Consistent follow-through on commitments, communication and candidate quality.

How Partnership Works

  1. Introduction & fit – You share your core capabilities, focus and interest areas.
  2. Alignment – We identify where our client needs and your strengths overlap.
  3. Pilots & roles – We start with a small set of roles or a focused scope.
  4. Feedback loop – We exchange feedback on submissions, process and communication.
  5. Scaling up – As trust grows, we expand into more roles or projects together.

Interested in Partnering?

If your organization is interested in exploring a partnership, the best starting point is to share your details and focus areas through our proposal form.

Examples of helpful details:

  • Primary industries and locations you support
  • Key technologies or roles you specialize in
  • Typical engagement models (contract, SOW, project)
  • Capacity and timelines for new work
